name: Ilmenite
body:
### Here you can find all of the Ilmenite projects from XLD Studios.

***

**Visit one of the Ilmenite Projects**

Ilmenite Framework
Ilmenite Slider

***

Ilmenite is a series of WordPress resources, currently consisting of a couple of plugins and a starter theme for quicker theme development.
These are made by XLD Studios, authored by Erik Bernskiold (@xldstudios) based on code and features that is typically created for most client projects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
